definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: cistern (or well), only pl. cstr. In [[נְוֹת כְּרׂת רׂעִים]] Zep 2:6 pastures of (= with) wells of shepherds, but text dub.; ´[[כ]] a gloss acc. to Kö:ii. 176, (§ 94 a) Anm.; LXX. krh/th\ We ([[כרת נות רעים והיתה]], as LXX. kereth = Philistia; v. further [[כְּרֵתִי]]; Böhme:ZAW vii. 1887, 212 views [[כְּרׂת]], plausibly, as erron. variant of preceding [[נְוֹת]], so Schwally:ib. x. 1890, 185, 186; Rosthstein in Kau:AT.
